info.name: Veg Italian White Sauce Penne Pasta
info.description: The Veg Italian White Sauce Penne Pasta is a delicious pasta dish made with penne pasta tossed in a creamy white sauce. The white sauce is made with liquid cheese, fresh cream, and oregano, and is then mixed with saut?ed onions, for added flavor and texture.

info.name: Paneer Peri Peri Pizza
info.description: Paneer Peri Peri Pizza is a delicious pizza that is typically made with a base of Mozzarella cheese and a spicy Peri-Peri sauce topped with chunks of Paneer, sliced onions, capsicum, tomatoes, and jalapeno peppers.

info.name: Sizzling Paneer Exotica Pizza
info.description: Sizzling Paneer Exotica Pizza is a spicy and delicious pizza that features a blend of different flavours and textures. This pizza is topped with chunks of spicy Paneer, sliced onions, black olives, mushrooms, and red paprika.

info.name: Veg Mexicana Pizza
info.description: Veg Mexicana Pizza is a spicy and delicious pizza that is loaded with vegetables and bold flavours.the pizza starts with a base of Mozzarella cheese and Italian pizza sauce topped with sliced onions, tomatoes, capsicum, jalape?os, red paprika, and green chillies.

info.name: Cheesy Chicken Pizza
info.description: Cheesy Chicken Pizza is a mouthwatering pizza that features a base of Italian pizza sauce, Mozzarella cheese, and tender chunks of chicken, all topped off with a generous amount of melted cheese.

info.name: Chicken Alfredo Pizza
info.description: Chicken Alfredo Pizza is a delicious and creamy pizza that features a base of Alfredo sauce, Mozzarella cheese, grilled chicken, sliced onions, capsicum, and black olives.

info.name: Chicken Tandoori Pizza
info.description: Chicken Tandoori Pizza is a delicious and flavourful pizza that features a base of Tandoori sauce, Mozzarella cheese, chicken tandoori, sliced onions, capsicum, and red paprika.

info.name: Butter Chicken Pizza
info.description: Butter Chicken Pizza is a delicious and creamy pizza that features a base of Makhani sauce, Mozzarella cheese, Mughlai butter chicken, sliced capsicum, onions, and garnished with chopped coriander.

info.name: Chicken Supreme Pizza
info.description: Chicken Supreme Pizza is a popular pizza that combines the flavors of Indian spices with classic pizza toppings. The Pizza features a base of Italian pizza sauce and mozzarella cheese, topped with spicy chicken, chicken tikka, and chicken meatballs, as well as sliced onions and capsicum.

info.name: Chicken Overloaded Pizza
info.description: Chicken Overloaded Pizza is a meat lover's dream! This pizza features a generous amount of Mozzarella cheese, along with a variety of chicken toppings, including herbed chicken, sausage, hot and spicy chicken, chicken meatballs, and chicken salami.

info.name: Veg Italian White Sauce Penne Pasta
info.description: The Veg Italian White Sauce Penne Pasta is a delicious pasta dish made with penne pasta tossed in a creamy white sauce. The white sauce is made with liquid cheese, fresh cream, and oregano, and is then mixed with saut?ed onions, for added flavor and texture.

info.name: Veg Italian Red Sauce Penne Pasta
info.description: Penne Pasta Tossed in a light Sauce of Tomatoes, with Red Onions, Capsicums, Corn and Garnished with Cheese

info.name: Veg Pink Sauce Penne Pasta
info.description: A Contemporary Pink Sauce Penne Pasta Saut?ed with Onions, Capsicums and Cheese

info.name: Chicken White Sauce Penne Pasta
info.description: Boneless | A comfort food favourite with chunky chicken simmered in a rich tomato sauce with red onions, corn and topped with tons of cheese

info.name: Chicken Red Sauce Penne Pasta
info.description: Boneless | A comfort food favourite with chunky chicken simmered in a rich tomato sauce with red onions, capsicum, corn with tons of cheese.

info.name: Chicken Pink Sauce Penne Pasta
info.description: Boneless | A contemporary pink sauce penne pasta sauteed with chunky chicken, onions, capsicums and cheese

info.name: Christmas Combo for 2
info.description: Enjoy the discounted combos for 2, including 2 regular pizzas, 1 side and 1 beverage from the available options.

info.name: Special Christmas Combo for 2
info.description: Choose any 2 special Pizzas from the below options

info.name: Special Christmas Combo for 4
info.description: Special Pizza Combo for 4, including 4 regular pizzas, 2 sides and 2 beverages!

info.name: Value Pizza Meal For 1
info.description: Meal For 1 ,Choose Your any 1 Small Pizza, Garlic Bread Sticks or Pepsi

info.name: Classic Pizza Meal for 1
info.description: Delicious Meal for 1 ,Choose Your any Small Pizza, Along with  Garlic bread Sticks or Choco Lava Cake Or Pepsi

info.name: Cheesy Alloo Masti Burger
info.description: Aloo tikki burger is a delicious fusion dish that combines the flavours of Indian cuisine with the classic American burger. Aloo tikki is a popular Indian street food made from mashed potatoes mixed with a variety of spices and herbs, shaped into patties typically consists of a soft burger bun, a vegetarian patty melted cheese, lettuce, tomato, onion.

info.name: Tandoori Chicken Burger
info.description: A chicken tandoori burger is a fusion of Indian and American cuisine that combines the bold flavours of tandoori chicken with the classic American burger. The burger typically features a juicy chicken patty that has been marinated in a mixture of yogurt and tandoori spices, which includes a blend of spices like cumin, coriander, ginger, garlic, and chili powder.This burger is a delicious and satisfying meal that is perfect for anyone who loves the bold and flavourful spices of Indian cuisine.

info.name: Cheesy Delight Salad
info.description: Cheesy Delight Salad is a Crisp mix of colorful garden-fresh vegetables, meticulously tossed to perfection, creating a symphony of flavors and textures that tantalize your taste buds. A wholesome and satisfying salad that celebrates nature's bounty in every bite.

info.name: Corn and Peas Salad
info.description: Corn and peas salad has natural sweetness of tender corn and peas, this refreshing medley offers a vibrant and wholesome twist to your plate. Enjoy a symphony of flavors and textures that celebrate the goodness of farm-fresh ingredients

info.name: Veg Paneer salad
info.description: Indulge in a delightful harmony of flavors with our Veg Paneer Salad with tender paneer cheese, lovingly combined with fresh greens and a generous sprinkle of cheese, creates a delectable balance of creaminess and crunch. A savory sensation that takes your salad experience to the next level.

info.name: Chicken and cheese salad
info.description: Salad is a perfect blend of protein with succulent chicken pieces paired with creamy cheese, nestled atop a bed of crisp greens and vibrant vegetables. Its a savory symphony that satisfies your cravings while keeping your meal light and refreshing.

info.name: Chicken and egg salad
info.description: A chicken and egg salad is a delicious and satisfying dish made with a combination of tender cooked chicken, eggs, and a variety of fresh vegetables and seasonings. This salad is known for its delightful mix of textures and flavors, making it a popular choice for lunch or a light dinner. Here's a description of a typical chicken and egg salad

info.name: Peri peri chicken salad
info.description: It contains hearty portions of tender chicken, accompanied by an array of fresh and vibrant ingredients, thus creating a satisfying and nourishing ensemble. Its a delicious balance of taste and nutrition that leaves you energized and satisfied.

info.name: 2 Veg pizzas (Pocket friendly)
info.description: Get 2 pocket friendly pizzas at never before seen prices!
